info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 02 at 7:18PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Garfield and north central Kane Counties through 745 PM MDT... At 718 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 11 miles southeast of Escalante, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Escalante. This includes Utah Route 12 between mile markers 63 and 66. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
